name: Blob Wars (Eyawiin)
description:
This is my Submission the the Lost Relic Games Game Jam.

How To Play:
Hold down the left Mouse Button to move the player(the green blob). The red blob acts as your weapon and is connected to you. Try to take down the enemies with your weapon to earn points. After 75 seconds you can spend your points for an upgrade that you will take into the next stage.
